name: nff
params: setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2

stmt.origin: nfxfr(s0, wf(c0, c1, c2), wa(wfn(c0, c1), wss(crn(c0), c2)))

body.origin:
|- wnf(s0, wf(c0, c1, c2))
-| wb(wf(c0, c1, c2), wa(wfn(c0, c1), wss(crn(c0), c2)))
-| wnf(s0, wa(wfn(c0, c1), wss(crn(c0), c2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wnf(s0, wf(c0, c1, c2))
-| wb(wf(c0, c1, c2), wa(wfn(c0, c1), wss(crn(c0), c2)))
-| wnf(s0, wa(wfn(c0, c1), wss(crn(c0), c2)))

body.origin: |- wb(wf(c0, c1, c2), wa(wfn(c0, c1), wss(crn(c0), c2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wnf(s0, wf(c0, c1, c2))
-| wnf(s0, wa(wfn(c0, c1), wss(crn(c0), c2)))

body.origin:

-| wnf(s0, wfn(c0, c1))
-| wnf(s0, wss(crn(c0), c2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wnf(s0, wf(c0, c1, c2))
-| wnf(s0, wfn(c0, c1))
-| wnf(s0, wss(crn(c0), c2))

body.origin:
|- wnf(s0, wfn(c0, c1))

-| wnfc(s0, c1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wnf(s0, wf(c0, c1, c2))
-| wnf(s0, wss(crn(c0), c2))
-| wnfc(s0, c0)
-| wnfc(s0, c1)

body.origin:
|- wnf(s0, wss(crn(c0), c2))
-| wnfc(s0, crn(c0))
-| wnfc(s0, c2)

cumulated.origin:
|- wnf(s0, wf(c0, c1, c2))

comment: Bound-variable hypothesis builder for a mapping. (Contributed by NM, 29-Jan-2004.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 15-Oct-2016.)
